articles.author: Michael Le Page
articles.title: Coronavirus: What you need to know to prepare for a covid-19 pandemic
articles.description: With the covid-19 virus spreading in a growing number of countries, many of us are wondering if and how we should prepare. Here's what to do
articles.content:
By Michael Le Page
Hand-washing can help you avoid catching the coronavirus
Tetra Images, LLC / Alamy
With coronavirus outbreaks in Europe and the Middle East, the covid-19 virus appears to be going pandemic. As public concern increases worldwide, unscient… [+6628 chars]
